price: 15. Oo waan badbaadinnay (Nuux) iyo kuwii kula jiray Doonnida, waxaana uga yeelnay calaamo5 (digniin) ummadaha.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: 5. Waxaa loola jeedaa doonnida, ama dhacdadaasi weyn.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-aṣḥāba al-safīnati wajaʿalnāhā āyatan lil'ʿālamīna
